MCP SERVER

Provenance
Tracking.

Every search, every citation, every piece of evidence is automatically logged. When you finalize, you get a complete audit trail of how you reached your answer.

  • <> exec_python — Run code against context
  • ⌕ search_context — Regex search with evidence logging
  • ✓ cite() — Tag findings with notes
  • ◉ evaluate_progress — Track convergence
